function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of physical barriers such as plexiglass, polycarbonate, and tempered glass in various industries and healthcare centers.","Impact":"Inadequate barriers may fail to prevent the spread of contagious diseases, increasing the risk of transmission.","Mitigation":"Regular inspection and maintenance of barriers, proper installation based on ventilation requirements, and appropriate material selection.","Technologies":"Advanced materials for barrier construction, automated monitoring systems for barrier maintenance.","People":"Workers, healthcare professionals, and customers in industries and healthcare centers.","Owner":"Facility managers, healthcare administrators, and business owners."},{"Description":"Implementation of administrative controls to minimize exposure to SARS-CoV-2 in workplace environments.","Impact":"Failure to implement effective administrative controls may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases among workers.","Mitigation":"Regular assessment of work procedures, minimizing worker contact, providing ongoing education and training, and enforcing the use of personal protective equipment.","Technologies":"Workplace scheduling software, communication platforms for remote meetings, and online training tools.","People":"Workers, managers, and employers in various industries.","Owner":"Employers, human resources departments, and workplace safety committees."},{"Description":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE) to prevent the transmission of contagious diseases in workplace environments.","Impact":"Inadequate use or maintenance of PPE can result in increased risk of infection among workers.","Mitigation":"Proper training on PPE use and maintenance, regular supply of high-quality PPE, and enforcement of usage protocols.","Technologies":"PPE tracking and monitoring systems, online training modules for PPE use, and quality control systems for PPE supply.","People":"Workers in various industries.","Owner":"Employers, PPE suppliers, and workplace safety committees."}]}
